name: Pixelworld Simulation
description:
Pixelworld is a falling-sang style game where you can place pixels on the screen, simulating their behaviors and interactions with other pixels like sand, water, bacterias, and more.

The game still in development, new types of elements should be added, along with some optimizations. Feel free to leave sugestions on the comments.

  • Controls
    • Left Click - Place pixels
    • Right click - hold to chage scroll mode
    • Scroll - Switch pixel type | Change brush radius
